page.title: 12ILMINGTON NEWS
page.content: The New Rector Ilmington has a new rector,Mr.Story, who came from Evesham.Every Wednesday he visits school. The Buzzards that came to school At school the children were shown a baby Lannar falcon,a baby kestrel and some kestrel and buzzard eggs.The babies ate scraps of meat.Most of the children flew an adult buzzard on the playing field.Twice it wandered off to scare birds away. The New Organ The organ at St.Mary's church is being replaced.The old one is going to another church. A Video-Recorder for the school The P.T.A. have bought a new video-recorder for Ilmington school so that the children can see lots of different programmes.
